About me

I am a fourth year Computer Engineering student attending the City College Of New York. Some of the technical skills I possess are C++, C#, Python, Java, github, and Android Studio. I have experince working on group projects/assignments and experince working on solo projects. I am really enthusiastic about programming and am looking for opportunities to apply my skills and learn more.

View Resume

Projects

RPS app

The RPS app is a mobile version of the Rock Paper Scissors game. The goal of this assignment was to create an Android app in a two man team. My group used java and the android studio framework to develop our app. We used github to manage and combine our work and used IntelliJ IDEA as our IDE.

Source Code

X86 Emulator

This program is a X86 8/16-bit emulator written in C++.x86 is a family of complex instruction set computer (CISC) instruction set architectures initially developed by Intel based on the Intel 8086 microprocessor and its 8088 variant. The program takes an x86 assembly code file compiled to machine code (.com) and executes the commands.
